feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:19 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 08:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with freezing rain beginning early this morning and ending near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
